# previousRefreshTokenClaimName

**Instance Property**

The claim name for the previous single sign-on token value in the authentication request.

## Declaration

```swift
var previousRefreshTokenClaimName: String { get set }
```

## Configuring the previous refresh token

- **includePreviousRefreshTokenInLoginRequest**: A Boolean value that indicates whether to include the previous refresh token in the authentation request.

items.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether to include the previous refresh token in the authentation request.
